countries.description: A list of countries of connectors to filter.

types.description: A list of types of connectors to filter.

name.description: Name alike look up of the connector

sandbox.description: Include sandbox connectors if set to true (default: false).

healthDetails.description: Include health details about latest connections and percentage of errors (connection rate)

isOpenFinance.description: Filter connectors by the `isOpenFinance` attribute. If not sent, it won't filter.

supportsPaymentInitiation.description: Filter connectors by the `supportsPaymentInitiation` attribute. If not sent, it won't filter.
